description: Try our easy to follow Baked Salmon With Cucumber Dill Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Baked Salmon With Cucumber Dill Sauce
name: Baked Salmon With Cucumber Dill Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the oven for 8-10 minutes, until the salmon is opaque when pierced with the tip of a knife. Using a slotted spatula, transfer the salmon to dinner plates. Stir the pan juices into the cucumber sauce. Spoon the sauce over the salmon. Serve hot.
